title: Wonder Woman New Details, Nemesis System Patent expires WHEN?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.26.25
description:
Go to https://kindafunny.com/chicago to grab your tickets!

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10%
off your first month.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
- GAMESCAST - how we would save WB Games
- The STREAM is Bless playing Dark Souls
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
- You can get today’s Gregway
- And you can get Alien vs Predator In Review this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:58 - Housekeeping
        -  The Roper Report   -
00:07:24 - Canceled Wonder Woman 'Was Gorgeous and Expansive,' Comic Book Writer Who Consulted on the Game Says
00:15:46 - Monolith's Shadow Of Mordor Nemesis System Patent Doesn't Expire For Another Decade
00:24:13 - More than 40% of all US PS5 and Xbox play time last month was spent on 10 live service games
00:34:32 - OG Xbox Exclusive Jade Empire Could Have Been 'Another Franchise' for BioWare if Not for 'Moronic Advice' From Microsoft
00:40:04 - Wee News!
00:47:50 - SuperChats
00:50:32 - You‘re Wrong
